CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1958, pg. 7, reads: "150 Youth Hear Expert Advice on Job Preparation at NAACP Career Confab - Apprentice Training - Youth attending this discussion group, under the leadership of John Allwine, area director, Department of Labor, Bureau of Apprenticeship, conferred on apprentice training. On Mr. Allwine's left are Larry Huff and Charles Hamilton, manager of the Pennsylvania State Employment Service. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: John Allwine, Larry Huff, and Charles Hamilton seated at table facing men and woman seated in chairs, at workshop during NAACP career conference, University of Pittsburgh Student Union
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Chairs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Tables--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Mirrors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.University of Pittsburgh.Student Union.
